label.span: Shehr: ; Town: ; UC: ; Center ka naam:

legend.span: Are you currently coughing?
Kya aapko khaasi hai?

label.span: If yes, for how long have you been coughing?

legend.span: Do you currently cough up sputum?
Kya aapki khaasi mein balgam ati hai?
Do you currently cough up blood?
Kya aapki khaasi mein khoon ata hai?
Do you currently have chest pain?
Kya aapko seeney mein dard mehsoos hota hai?
Do you currently have a fever?
Kya aapko bhukar hai?
Do you currently have drenching night sweats (so that you have to change your bedclothes)?
Kya aapko thandey paseeney atey hain?
In the past month, have you unexpectedly lost weight?
Kya aapka wazan bohut tezi se gir raha hai?
Do you currently have any other symptoms(s)?
Kya aapko koi aur alamaat hain?

label.span: Must be at least 1 year old and less than 120 years of age

legend.span: Gender
Jins

label.span: Maximum 20 digits and cannot contain anything other than number

legend.span: Have you ever been in close contact with someone who was sick with TB?
Kya aapke kissi kareebi dost ya rishtedaar ko TB howa hai?
Have you ever taken TB treatment for more than one month?
Kya aapne kabhi TB ka ilaaj karwaya hai?

label.span: If yes, what was the outcome of your previous TB treatment?
Agar haan, tou uska nateja kya tha?

span.span: ilaaj ke liye koi aur jagah ruju kiya

legend.span: Have you had an HIV test in the past?
Kya aapne HIV ka test pishley 6 mahino mein karwaya hai?

label.span: If yes, what is your HIV status?
100 huroof se ziada nahi likh sakhtey

input.name: /screening_form/screening_symptom/presumptive
input.data-calculate: if( /screening_form/screening_symptom/cough ='yes' or /screening_form/screening_symptom/chest_pain ='yes' or /screening_form/screening_symptom/cough_phlegm ='yes' or /screening_form/screening_symptom/fever ='yes' or /screening_form/screening_symptom/night_sweats ='yes' or /screening_form/screening_symptom/weight_loss ='yes' or /screening_form/screening_symptom/haemoptysis ='yes','yes','no')
